About Live Eye Tv

Music+Video=Pure Sonic Desire!

Live Eye TV is a music and video blog, as well as a boutique media production studio located in Seattle, WA. Featuring daily and weekly media and news updates, the Live Eye TV blog presents new tracks and music videos, as well as still photos from live performances in Seattle from a variety of national touring acts and local artists.

Live Eye Tv began in 2004 as a cable access show in Seattle, WA. At the time, we focused on filming touring bands at local clubs and interspersed those performances with music videos. After fifteen episodes as a cable access show, Live Eye Tv began to morph into a music and video blog, focusing on daily and weekly reviews of tracks and music videos, with music news thrown in for good measure.

Live Eye Tvâ€™s Light Factory Productions is a team of videographers, producers, editors, and animators specializing in the production of music video content. We are located in Seattle, WA and can be contacted at liveeyetv@somedomain.com. Whether you need help editing a smaller project or help planning and shooting a larger idea, we can work with budgets of many sizes. Our crew has access to a wide range of gear and can help you keep your shoot within budget. Need a music video? Then, get in touch!

Contact:

Wanna contribute? Like what you see? Think you have something to add? Contact us at liveeyetv@somedomain.com! Please include links to your work via YouTube, Soundcloud, or Bandcamp, as well as some pertinent info about your band or project!
